```{python}
#| label: fig-basic-ota-small-signal
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "5-transistor OTA small-signal model."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2)
    d.config(fontsize=16)
    
    d.push()
    elm.Line().left().length(1).dot(open=True).label('vin,p', 'left').idot(open=True)
    d.pop()
    elm.Gap().down().label(['+', 'vgs1', '-'])
    elm.Line().right().length(3).dot().idot(open=True)
    
    d.push()
    l1 = elm.Line().right().length(4).dot()
    gds5 = elm.Resistor().down().label('gds5')
    elm.Ground()
    d.pop()

    Ids1 = elm.SourceI().label('gm12 vgs1').reverse()
    elm.Line().length(2).dot()
    d.push()
    Cgs34 = elm.Capacitor().label('Cgs34')
    elm.Vdd()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().right().length(3)
    Ids3 = elm.SourceI().label('gm34 vgs34')
    elm.Vdd()

    elm.Line().right().length(3).at(gds5.start).dot()
    Ids2 = elm.SourceI().label('gm12 vgs2').reverse()
    elm.Line().up().length(1).dot()
    out = d.here
    elm.Line().up().length(1)
    Ids4 = elm.SourceI().label('gm34 vgs34')
    elm.Vdd()
    
    elm.Line().right().at(Ids2.start)
    gds2 = elm.Resistor().up().label('gds2')
    elm.Line().up().length(1).dot()
    elm.Line().up().length(1)
    gds4 = elm.Resistor().up().label('gds4')
    elm.Vdd()

    elm.Line().right().at(out).length(8).label('vout')
    elm.Line().down().length(2)
    Cload = elm.Capacitor().down().label('Cload')
    elm.Line().down().toy(gds5.start)
    elm.Ground()

    elm.Line().right().at(gds2.start).length(2).idot().dot(open=True)
    elm.Gap().up().label(['-', 'vgs2', '+'])
    elm.Line().right().length(1).dot(open=True).label('vin,n', 'right').idot(open=True)

    elm.Line().left().length(3).at(Cgs34.start).dot(open=True)
    elm.Gap().up().label(['+', 'vgs34', '-'])
    elm.Dot(open=True)
    elm.Vdd()
```
